sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { CBadge, CCard, CCardBody, CCardHeader, CCol, CDataTable, CButton, CRow, } from '@coreui/react' import ProductDetail from './ProductDetail' import usersData from '../../views/users/UsersData' const getBadge = status => { switch (status) { case 'Active': return 'success' case 'Inactive': return 'secondary' case 'Pending': return 'warning' case 'Banned': return 'danger' default: return 'primary' } } const fields = ['name','image', 'price', 'brand', { key: 'actions', _style: { width: '15%'} }] const Tables = () => { const [large, setLarge] = useState(false) return ( <> Danh sách sản phẩm ( {item.status} ), 'actions': (item)=>( setLarge(!large)} className="mr-1 mb-1 mb-xl-0" color="secondary" color="warning" > Sửa setLarge(!large)} className="mr-1" color="danger" > Xóa ) }} /> ) } export default Tables
